DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigated acute intake effect fresh-squeezed orange juice ( FOJ ) , process orange juice ( POJ ) , isoenergetic orange-flavored drink ( control ) postprandial response blood serum biomarkers ( glucose , insulin , leptin adiponectin ) , anti-oxidatant status , prospective food intake lean obese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Postprandial Response Fresh-squeezed Processed Orange Juice Lean Obese Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Non-randomized crossover clinical trial , eligible participant ( n= 36 ) allocate accordance body mass index two group , lean ( n = 18 , 9 women/9 men ) obese ( n = 18 , 9 women/9 men ) . Subjects group intake one single dose ( 5 mL/kg body weight ) isoenergetic beverage three different phase : ( 1 ) fresh-squeezed orange juice ( FOJ ) , ( 2 ) commercial process orange juice ( POJ ) ( 3 ) energy sugars-matched orange-flavored drink ( control ) , washout period seven day among beverage . Thirty minute intake beverage , participant flavonoid-free standard breakfast , contain coffee ( infusion ) , milk , sugar sweetener , white bread sandwich lean ham light cream cheese , salt sweet biscuit . Posteriorly , blood sample ( 10 mL ) collect 30 , 60 , 120 300 min intervention catheter instal vein arm . After blood collection , volunteer instruct record meal throughout day , note amount eaten food . The sample number take account variation blood serum glucose type I error α = 0.05 type II error β = 0.2 ( 80 % power ) . Primary output modification glucose insulin concentration induce different beverage point curve . The secondary output antioxidant activity induce FOJ and/or POJ . Kolmogorov Smirnov Levene test , respectively assessed normality homogeneity data . Area curve ( AUC0-300 min ) calculate clearance appetite related-biomarkers ( glucose , insulin , leptin adiponectin ) 300 min trial phase Other parameter , maximum concentration ( Cmax ) , time reach maximum blood concentration ( Tmax ) also estimate . AUC determine trapezoidal method Microcal Software Inc. , Origin® 6.0 . One-way analysis variance ( ANOVA ) follow Sidak post hoc apply compare effect intervention appetite related-biomarkers , anti-oxidant status beverage composition . P significance set ≤ 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy men woman volunteer ; 2 . Volunteers BMI 18.5 39.9 kg/m2 . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Volunteers BMI 40 kg/m2 ; 2 . Smokers volunteer ; 3 . Volunteers treatment drug ( except contraceptive ) , vitamins nutritional supplement ; 4 . Volunteers diet weight loss ; 5 . Volunteers gain lost 3 kg weight last 3 month ; 6 . Volunteers consume 20 g alcohol per day 7 . Volunteers practice intense physical activity ( 5 hour per week ) .
